Room.Name: Jerome's Red Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a bare room with red walls in Jerome's School for Fighters.
Room.LongDescription: Tarl, the eldest son of Jerome, stands in the far corner with his arms folded and his weapon at his side. You must defeat him to gain the key to the advancement room. Tarl is so confident you will not best him that he will allow you the first blow. Why don't you wait till he blinks?
